title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Wednesday, 4 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: john mcgreal is named colchester united 's new first-team coach .
ukip councillor suspended by party following allegations he sent offensive emails from his council account .
man admits gbh after hand 'cut off ' in loughton attack .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume on thursday at 08:00 .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from us today at essex live - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back in the morning from 08:00 for the latest news across the country .
enjoy the sunshine .

documents.title: john mcgreal on 'great time ' to join relegated colchester united
text: colchester 's newly-appointed first-team coach john mcgreal has told me he feels like now is the right time to step-up .
the 43-year-old former tranmere and ipswich defender replaces kevin keen , who left last week after the club 's relegation to league two was confirmed .
`` i feel like i 've done my apprenticeship as i 've been here six or seven years coaching .
i think with the new process that we have at the top it 's a great time to take the club forward '' , he said .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: five tonnes of straw destroyed in margaretting fire
text: more than five tonnes of straw has been destroyed in a fire near chelmsford .
essex fire and rescue says it was called to church lane in margaretting at about 14:30 this afternoon .
the blaze , which happened inside a building , was extinguished 30 minutes later .
there are no reports of any injuries .

documents.title: essex draw with worcestershire
text: essex 's county championship match against worcestershire at new road has ended in a draw .
essex finished on 95 for two in their second innings , with alastair cook unbeaten on 48 .
you can follow reaction to the day 's play here .

documents.title: in the news : colchester united appoint john mcgreal as first-team coach kitten found taped inside shoebox
text: here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: murder accused brett rogers 'once left father with broken eye '
text: a father has told jurors how his son , who is accused of murdering his mother , once left him with a broken eye socket .
brett rogers , 23 , allegedly knifed gillian phillips , 54 , and david oakes , 60 , dozens of times in a fatal attack at her home in stansted mountfitchet in july last year .
former milkman mr rogers , of stansted mountfitchet , denies two counts of murder .
the trial at chelmsford crown court continues .

documents.title: weather : fine with sunshine
text: this afternoon will continue to be fine with plenty of sunshine and light winds .
the sun may turn periodically hazy as some higher level cloud rolls over .
maximum temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: kitten found taped inside a shoebox at bus stop
text: a six-week-old kitten has been found taped inside a shoebox in south ockendon , the rscpa says .
the black and white feline , who has been named loubi , was discovered by a member of the public at a bus stop in south road on thursday .
the animal charity says loubi is in a `` very good condition '' and will be rehomed in due course .

documents.title: how twitter reacted to colchester 's new appointment
text: the news that john mcgreal has been appointed the new first-team coach for colchester united has had a mixed reaction on twitter .
xdiamondgeezer7 tweeted : `` totally bad move for me shows no ambition '' .
kieran wrote : `` very predictable appointment playing it safe with internal appointment we need new direction someone like teddy sheringham '' .
finally , samantha said : `` got to say i wish mcgreal the best as our manager and hope he can get @ twitterid back into league one asap '' .

documents.title: fan 's view : 'we do n't have a choice '
text: colchester united fan ian hipkin told us earlier he was hoping that former hartlepool manager ronnie moore would become the next colchester united boss .
following the announcement this afternoon , he said : `` we do n't have a choice so there 's no point getting angry over things you ca n't control . ''

documents.title: what we know so far about colchester 's new first-team coach
text: if you 're just joining us , here 's what we know so far about john mcgreal 's appointment as colchester united 's first-team coach .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: john mcgreal and chairman pose for photo opportunity
text: a signing would n't be official without the mandatory `` on the pitch holding a shirt '' photo opportunity .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: steve ball named colchester 's new assistant manager
text: steve ball will leave his role as manager at maldon & tiptree to assist new first-team coach john mcgreal at colchester , the club has announced .
breaking news : first team manager , steve ball has left the club -
steve will join @ twitterid as the assistant manager to their first team under their new manager , john mcgreal .
@ twitterid @ twitterid this arrangement does n't help your club .
you need stability yourselves .

documents.title: who is john mcgreal ?
text: john mcgreal has been announced as colchester united 's new first-team coach , but who is he ?

documents.title: it 's not clear who will take charge of colchester for sunday 's game
text: david wright wo n't be in charge on sunday due to a family bereavement .
mcgreal will make fresh start in summer .
not sure who 'll take game
@ twitterid mr bean

documents.title: mcgreal : a great time to come in and get colchester moving
text: john mcgreal says he wants to get colchester united moving in the `` right direction '' .
it 's obviously a negative to get relegated , but i think it 's a great time to come in and get colchester united moving in the right direction again . ''

documents.title: mcgreal was cowling 's 'first choice '
text: colchester united chairman robbie cowling says john mcgreal was his `` first choice '' to be the club 's new first-team coach .
cowling added he felt `` more comfortable '' than with the previous appointment of former manager kevin keen .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: mcgreal to take charge after sunday 's game
text: colchester 's new manager john mcgreal will take charge of the side after sunday 's game with rochdale .
the announcement came at a press conference where mcgreal sat alongside chairman robbie cowling and director of football tony humes .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: the moment john mcgreal was revelead to the press
text: john mcgreal is new # colu manager

documents.title: john mcgreal appointed as new colchester united first-team coach
text: colchester united have appointed john mcgreal as their new first-team coach .
the 43-year-old former ipswich and tranmere defender replaces kevin keen , who left last week following the club 's relegation to league two .
mcgreal becomes the third recent boss to step up to the first team having previously worked in the youth set up , following joe dunne and tony humes .

documents.title: breakingcolchester united name new boss
text: john mcgreal has been named as the new colchester united first-team coach .

documents.title: fan 's view : we need a manager who is n't afraid to make his feelings known
text: samantha is hoping colchester united appoint a manager with some football league experience .
going on our past few seasons i think it 's clear we need a manager with some football league experience .
believe we have had managers in who are on a `` learning curve '' and it has finally cost us league one status .
we need a manger who is n't afraid to make it known his feelings with regards to player performances . ''

documents.title: colchester united press conference imminent
text: the scene is set we 're ready for the colchester united press conference , which is due to start at 14:00 .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: fan 's view : i 'd prefer an external appointment
text: who would you like to see appointed as colchester united 's new manager ?
for my husband and i we would prefer an external appointment , someone who can carry on with the good work keen started .
someone who appreciates the fans and not divides the club and fans like we feel humes did .
the cowley brothers or kem izzet possibly . ''
get involved with the discussion via email , twitter , or facebook .

documents.title: will colchester appoint internally or externally ?
text: the majority of colchester united fans got what they wanted when chairman robbie cowling appointed an external candidate , with the hiring of kevin keen in december .

but with keen lasting just over four months in the role , and the speed in which the u 's are ready to announce an appointment , the indication this time is that cowling is hiring from within the club .
it 's what he did with the appointments of joe dunne and tony humes in recent years .
current under-21 's coach john mcgreal is the overwhelming favourite to take on the job , with current caretaker david wright also a possibility .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: fan 's view : ronnie moore would be an ideal candidate
text: do you agree with ian that ronnie moore is an `` ideal candidate '' for the colchester job ?
robbie cowling wants a cheap `` yes man '' who will agree to anything he says .
we need an old experienced league manager to guide us through a tricky league two campaign .
if you 're asking me , ronnie moore would be an ideal candidate . ''

documents.title: colchester united manager : the main contenders
text: if you go by what the bookies think , it seems as if colchester under-21s coach john mcgreal will be announced the new manager this afternoon .
although if you were looking to put a pound on , betting on most sites has now been suspended .

documents.title: colchester manager announcement expected at 14:00
text: i 'm at the weston homes community stadium this afternoon , as colchester are expected to name their new manager within the hour .
we 'll have live updates throughout the afternoon , along with analysis and reaction from our sports team .
as ever , we love hearing what you think .
you can send us an email , a tweet , or visit our facebook page .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: your essex basks in glorious sunshine
text: no this is not a mediterranean marina - it 's wivenhoe , and was sent to us by bbc weather watcher east egg .
if you 're out enjoying the sunshine you can share your with us via email , twitter , or facebook .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: in the news : colchester to name new manager ukip councillor suspended over offensive email allegations
text: here are the top stories from essex this lunch time :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: teenage boys robbed by three men in clacton
text: two teenage boys in clacton have been robbed by three men , one of whom was believed to have been carrying a knife .
essex police says the victims , aged 15 and 16 , were forced to hand over valuables including a bag and a mobile phone in vista road on monday afternoon .
all three suspects were described as white , aged in their 20s , and of medium build .
they wore dark scarves over their faces .

documents.title: get involved : basildon or balearics ?
text: we love a good chat about the weather do n't we ?
especially when some forecasters are predicting essex could be hotter than ibiza by the end of the week .
chris wrote on our facebook page : `` leaving gran canaria today so the warm weather will be welcomed .
may the holiday continue . ''
andy said : `` costa del canvey - ok on a good day when it 's sunny ! ''
meanwhile , martin was n't having any of it : `` it will be hotter for about three days , wow . ''
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: army and navy warning about flyover
text: if you 're travelling over the army and navy one-lane flyover in chelmsford , you are being warned to check the signs to ensure the carriageway is open .
at the moment the direction of traffic is changed at fixed times .
however , from monday essex county council says it will trial a system to change the direction depending on the flow of traffic .
it 's hoped the new system will `` improve the effectiveness of the flyover for drivers '' .

documents.title: who are your essex police and crime commissioner candidates ?
text: the five candidates for the essex police and crime commissioner role are canvassing for one final day ahead of tomorrow 's election .
but who are they ?
last month the candidates took part in a live debate .
you can relive it here .

documents.title: ukip councillor suspended over offensive email allegations
text: a thurrock ukip councillor has been suspended by his party following allegations that offensive emails were sent to residents from his council account .
councillor james baker , who represents east tilbury , will now face an internal investigation by his party .
thurrock council also says it is aware of the allegations and is looking into it .
the matter is not thought to be connected with allegations of malicious communication made about ukip councillor and mep tim aker .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex head for a draw against worcestershire
text: essex are heading for a draw on day four of their county championship match against worcestershire .
the home side are 226 for five - that 's still 225 behind , but with just one day 's play to go .
you can follow live commentary and updates here .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: will essex be hotter than ibiza ?
text: you may have read reports that britain is set to bask in temperatures hotter than ibiza towards the end of the week - but will we feel the heat here in essex ?
temperatures in the county could reach 23c ( 73f ) on saturday and sunday , but there will be more cloud , with the chance of the odd thundery showers , says bbc weather presenter kate kinsella .
the mercury on the white isle is set to reach the low 20s , so if you were planning a trip to the party island you may well be better off postponing for a few weeks .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man admits gbh after hand 'cut off ' in loughton attack
text: a 30-year-old man has admitted causing serious injury to another man in loughton , where it was reported his hand was cut off .
paul saunders , from biggin lane in grays , pleaded guilty to wounding with intent to cause grievous bodily harm at chelmsford crown court yesterday .
he will be sentenced on 27 may .
three other men from grays , aged 19 , 20 , and 21 , who were arrested at the time of the incident in november have been released without charge .

documents.title: travel : one lane blocked on london-bound a12
text: a12 londonbound-accident just before j28 ( football stad ) - queues on a12 to j30 stratford st mary-queues on a120 westbound towards a12 j29 .

documents.title: colchester united to announce new manager
text: colchester united fans will learn the identity of their new manager this afternoon .
kevin keen left the role last week following colchester 's relegation to league two .
under-21s coach john mcgreal is favourite for the job .
a press conference will be held at 14:00 .
we 'll have full coverage throughout the day .

documents.title: weather : fine with sunshine
text: it will be a generally fine day with plenty of sunshine and light winds .
the sun may turn periodically hazy later , as some higher level cloud rolls in .
maximum temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast with bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: in the news : man admits gbh after hand 'cut off ' colchester united to announce new manager
text: here are the top stories from essex this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning and welcome to essex live .
join us until 18:00 for the latest news for the county - plus live coverage of colchester 's managerial announcement later this afternoon .
if you 'd like to share a story you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
